>Construction of pLYC8
acquire oligo ZH1			
acquire oligo ZH1R
acquire oligo ZH2
acquire oligo ZH2R
acquire oligo ZH3
acquire oligo ZH3R
acquire plasmid pLYC5
acquire plasmid pAtipiTrc
PCR ZH1,ZH2R on pLYC5	(3293 bp, pcrA)
PCR ZH2,ZH3R on pLYC5	(3667 bp, pcrB)
PCR ZH3,ZH1R on pAtipiTrc (1349 bp, pcrC)
Assemble pcrA,pcrB,pcrC	(Gibson, pLYC8)
Transform pLYC8	(Mach1, Amp)
